'''Christopher Fairbank''' ([[4 October|October 4]], [[1953]]) is an English actor. He has played in many British television series, and his best known role is Moxey in ''[[wikipedia:Auf Wiedersehen, Pet|Auf Wiedersehen, Pet]]''. He has also had supporting roles in big features as ''[[wikipedia:Alien 3|AlienÂ³]]'', ''[[wikipedia:The Fifth Element|The Fifth Element]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Batman (1989 movie)|Batman]]''.
